title: The Saints Have Joined the NFC Elite, Plus Rams-Packers Takeaways | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 332)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to discuss where the Saints rank in the NFC after Sunday night’s win over the Vikings, and what we learned about the Packers after their showdown with the Rams (0:25). Then the guys offer their “Stock Ups” and “Stock Downs” of the week, throw challenge flags on the Giants and the 49ers, and predict tomorrow’s headlines (17:15).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
